title: Looking to make serious team !!!
body:
I am in the middle of making a new team and so far I have everyone except a Top, Jungle,Mid and support. I need people within gold-high silver. I am looking for people who are gonna be determined and not just gonna give up after 1 loss. Nothing good will ever come instantly. The team goal for right now is to become friends and gain elo and learn the game better and improve. Afterwards, if we stick together and want to we can enter tournaments.

Fill out this form so i can see a little bit about you to make the process easier.
ONLY LOOKING FOR TOP, MID,JUNGLE

IGN -
Age -
Rank -
Role -
Champs you play -
Time Zone -
Comms(whatever you prefer) -
Experience -
Why you want to join? -

replies.body:
IGN - Derelict Heart
Age - 22
Rank - Silver 3 in Flex, Unranked in Solo
Role - Support/JG
Champs you play - Support- Rakan, Lulu, Thresh, Nami. JG- Kha'Zix, Hecarim, Nunu
Time Zone - EST
Comms(whatever you prefer) - Discord
Experience - Been playing since season 3. Hit Plat in Seasons 6 and 7
Why you want to join? - I like playing with teams because I feel it makes me a better player overall. And I like playing with people :3

IGN -DTEcstasy
Age -21
Rank -well g5 on my main but its explainable
Role -jg/top
Champs you play -jg-ww, yi, moa/top garen, yas, orn
Time Zone -est
Comms(whatever you prefer) -discord
Experience -s6
Why you want to join? - i feel i can contribute to a team and have fun. i like to learn from my mistakes and also give advice to others when they need it.

IGN-JPBTW
age-23
rank-s1
role-anyrthing but ad
timezone-est

exp-3 seasons

Hey Guys Update!!!!! 

MSG ME FOR Discord so you can get in here for tryouts!!!!!

Why you want to join? -  Looking for friends and I want to be serious.  I don't care about soloq because playing by myself is boring.

Why you want to join? - I want to improve with a like minded team and hopefully start kicking some ass in Clash eventually. I also hate solo queue.

Ign: Dove9

Champs you play: Janna, Braum, Nami, karma, brand, Alistair, Tariq, Tahm Kench, and thresh
Time zone: central
Comms: Discord
Experience: played since season 2, this account since season 5. Been adc but enjoy support and been support main for last two seasons.
Why: because I like be playing and enjoy good teammates who I can trust. The game is more fun with those you enjoy being around. I also feel like you get better when you create a core team and learn new styles to play together.
